Subject: Ground Handling Operations commence
Source Text: Definition Commence of Ground Handling Operations (ACGT).

Subject: AO/GH provides Ground Handling Started information
Source Text: Origin and priority Aircraft Operator / Ground Handler will provide the information.

Subject: ACGT occurrence triggers updates
Source Text: Effect The occurrence of ACGT triggers an update of downstream estimates

Subject: TOBT updated by AO/GH
Source Text: TOBT is updated automatically or inserted manually by the Aircraft Operator / Ground Handler, calculated on the basis of the estimated turn-round period for the departing flight.

Subject: Check AO/GH TOBT consistency with ATC Flight Plan
Source Text: Procedures To check whether the AO/GH TOBT is consistent with the ATC Flight Plan.

Subject: Network Operations informed of TTOT changes
Source Text: Network Operations is informed when the TTOT changes by more than the agreed TTOT tolerance.

Subject: ACGT occurs
Source Text: This process is triggered by Actual Commence of Ground Handling: ACGT

Subject: ETTT/TOBT, TTOT updated in ACISP
Source Text: Operation (ACISP) ETTT/TOBT, TTOT updated

Subject: Verify feasibility of ATC Flight Plan
Source Text: This check shall be performed to verify feasibility of the ATC Flight Plan given the updated TOBT or ATC Flight Plan.

Subject: Respect TTOT tolerance
Source Text: A TTOT tolerance is respected before Network Operations is informed on updated TTOT.
